title: Fragment, 18th century
medium:
Medium: silk
Technique: warp-faced plain weave foundation with discontinuous supplementary wefts bound on the front in 3/1 twill and free-floating on the back.
description: Square repeat of a branch with curving leaves and large blossoms [one red, one blue] growing out of a shell-shaped mound.  The background is brown.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fragment, 18th century.Medium: silk
